subject: RE: [junit] Need example JUnit tests to validate Test Mentor's support of JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Is there a command line version, or an interactive API? I would probably want to integrate this tool into the build process, so I need a way to automate
messageBody:
Michael Silverstein wrote:
>I threw together a screen capture to illustrate at:
>http://www.silvermark.com/evaluators/5.3result_junit.html
Is there a command line version, or an interactive API?

I would probably want to integrate this tool into the build process, so I need a way to automate the testing and results. That way I can become a build nazi, and notify the offending programmer every time he/she checks in code that is not tested.


Regards,

Mike
